promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi young rare lizard electric-type pokemon wearing dark armor. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltleth, a a chibi young rare lizard electric-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Thundering Hurricane, Metallic Bolt. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lizard", "electric" or "Voltleth". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, lizard-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lightning background
generatedDescription: This playful mountain dweller uses Thundering Hurricane to stir up storms, while Metallic Bolt charges its tiny scales. A true spark of life in the wilderness.
